items.headline: The so-called ‘great debasement trade’ is back on as gold sets fresh record, says this strategist
items.summary_en: A rise in geopolitical tensions and the search for inflation hedges are fuelling the surge in precious metal prices

items.headline: Clearwater Analytics went on a buying spree. Now it’s getting bought in an $8.4 billion deal.
items.summary_en: Clearwater Analytics over the weekend agreed to a buyout from private-equity firms, after the stock market failed to reward a string of acquisitions the fund management accounting software provider made.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘Springsteen’ star Jeremy Allen White on his favorite reality shows and obsession with real estate
items.summary_en: The actor says he likes to “decompress” by perusing properties he knows he’ll likely never buy.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
items.summary_en: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: My husband and I are splitting our estate between his child and my three children. Should they get equal shares?
items.summary_en: “We try to help all our kids when we can, yet push for self-sufficiency.”

items.headline: U.S. stock futures rise, gold and silver hit records as investors hold out hope for a Christmas rally
items.summary_en: U.S. stock futures gained Sunday, ahead of the holiday-shortened trading week and as investors cling to hopes of a “Santa Claus rally” still to come.

items.headline: ‘I don’t know how much my wife earns’: I’m 63 with $6.4 million in stocks, mostly Apple. Will I get punished on taxes?
items.summary_en: “Each of our properties are worth over $1 million.”

items.headline: ‘I’m terrified I’ll be homeless when my husband, 76, stops working’: We only have $100K. What happens to people like us?
